local_intent: Ensure the Pepsi can is in-hand, hold for 1000 ms to stabilize, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Pepsi can has been grasped and slightly raised prior to this hold phase.
coherence_with_global: Aligns with GLOBAL_BT sequence after RaiseHeld: verifies object in gripper, performs HoldObject, then checks IsGraspStable.
